formattedAddress: 51 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 51 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
I purchased my last three suits from Klein, Epstein snd Parker along with three custom made shirts, and couldn't be happier. The product is beautiful and James' service is impeccable.

I wouldn't buy a suit anywhere else.

text.text:
I purchased my last three suits from Klein, Epstein snd Parker along with three custom made shirts, and couldn't be happier. The product is beautiful and James' service is impeccable.

I wouldn't buy a suit anywhere else.

originalText.text: Excellent service and seemingly endless fabric options. Overall, quality stuff.  James will take good care of you!

text.text: Excellent service and seemingly endless fabric options. Overall, quality stuff.  James will take good care of you!

originalText.text: The shop is super nice and they have a great selection of fabrics. I went there for a suit and a couple dress shirts.  I was very warmly welcomed by the store manager Francois, who took really good care of me along the process, which turned out to be a lot smoother than I expected. Francois brought the suit and shirts to my midtown work office.  I was really happy with the shirts and suit, perfect fit ! I would totally recommend K,E&P to friends and family.

text.text: The shop is super nice and they have a great selection of fabrics. I went there for a suit and a couple dress shirts.  I was very warmly welcomed by the store manager Francois, who took really good care of me along the process, which turned out to be a lot smoother than I expected. Francois brought the suit and shirts to my midtown work office.  I was really happy with the shirts and suit, perfect fit ! I would totally recommend K,E&P to friends and family.

originalText.text: Great shirts! In 2014 I got my first MR custom shirt while visiting Tribeca (actually went there to go to the Ludlow Shop next door...and didnt buy anything there!). Julie graciously welcomed me into the shop and introduced me to the concept, which, at that time was a concept for which I was unfamiliar...a custom shirt? Why, yes! Julie explained all the measurements and approach to sizing the perfect fitting shirt and explained all the options I had in designing my first shirt. While I was there I even got to chat with the Founder, Manuel. A few weeks later I got my first shirt and it fit perfectly. Whenever I wear it I feel super confident knowing it fits so well and looks so sharp. I get compliments often. 2 years later, the shirt still fits, no issues whatsoever and I continue to wear it for those special occasions. I also ordered my second MR shirt 2 years later and was able to email Julie to let her know to make a few micro adjustments to my chest area due to working out for 2 years my chest was a bit larger. No problem, she adjusted on my profile and I received my shirt in just a couple weeks. I am a loyal customer and will continue to probably buy a shirt a year from MR, if not more.

originalText.text: Bought a few shirts here. They claim shirts are made in France, maybe they are, but I can't tell the difference from the ones I've had made in Hong Kong or China in either fabric or tailoring. Inconsistent sizing across the different shirts and had same experience as the reviewer below. They can't even get it right after numerous attempts to fix. Would say for this price, find a good tailor in midtown and skip this place.
